metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15565 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Poppler 0.59.0, a NULL Pointer Dereference exists in the GfxImageColorMap::getGrayLine() function in GfxState.cc via a crafted PDF document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15565` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.8
libpoppler-cpp0 - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.8
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.8
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.8
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.8
libpoppler44 - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.8
poppler-utils - 0.24.5-2ubuntu4.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.24.5-2ubuntu4.8').
